overview: Soupalunch Heroes is a film created by Alchemy Film & Arts with Reaching Out, the community-based project of Hawick Congregational Community Church, which coordinates a small team of volunteers to buy, prepare and serve food to 60 people of all ages every Wednesday. The film was made as part of Film Town, Alchemy Film & Artsâ€™ community filmmaking project.
title: Soupalunch Heroes
